rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
基于人工智能的方法揭示了影响儿童健康结果的社会模式由威尔康奈尔医学院研究人员领导的团队使用基于人工智能的方法来揭示人们出生、成长、生活、工作和年龄条件之间的潜在模式，称为健康的社会决定因素（SDoH），然后将其联系起来每种模式都会影响儿童的健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/AI-based-approach-uncovers-social-patterns-that-impact-child-health-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/AI-based-approach-uncovers-social-patterns-that-impact-child-health-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41ff453e-aade-46cc-85cd-40aee8e7eee0 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 14:47:57 -0500 AI-based approach uncovers social patterns that impact child health outcomes
研究人员开发了反映大脑物理限制的人工智能系统剑桥大学的科学家们已经证明，对人工智能系统施加物理约束——就像人脑必须在物理和生物约束下发育和运行一样——允许它开发复杂生物体大脑的特征，从而解决任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Researchers-develop-AI-system-that-mirrors-brains-physical-constraints.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Researchers-develop-AI-system-that-mirrors-brains-physical-constraints.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=118f03a6-9c47-4770-83f9-d1f6d5069797 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 14:37:31 -0500 Researchers develop AI system that mirrors brain's physical constraints
新的类器官模型可能导致结肠相关疾病的个性化治疗南卡罗来纳医科大学和辛辛那提儿童医院的一个团队开发了一种复杂的模型来研究患病结肠，这可能会导致癌症和炎症性肠病（IBD）等结肠相关疾病的个性化治疗的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/New-organoid-model-could-lead-to-personalized-treatments-for-colon-lated-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/New-organoid-model-could-lead-to-personalized-treatments-for-colon-lated-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29da0d4b-095e-40b9-9765-def2e24015c9 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 14:27:42 -0500 New organoid model could lead to personalized treatments for colon-related diseases
研究首次对家庭护理人员的疼痛和关节炎经历进行了全国性评估威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员首次对护理人员的疼痛和关节炎经历进行了全国性评估，这些经历可能会限制他们在照顾年长家庭成员时执行必要任务的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-provides-the-first-national-estimate-of-family-caregivers-pain-and-arthritis-experiences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-provides-the-first-national-estimate-of-family-caregivers-pain-and-arthritis-experiences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a236037-b477-4c87-bb16-47f99eb0c25d Mon, 20 Nov 2023 14:21:16 -0500 Study provides the first national estimate of family caregivers' pain and arthritis experiences
华大基因组报告揭示了地中海贫血筛查的知识差距和障碍据泰国公共卫生部称，大约 18-2400 万人（即 30-40% 的泰国人口）携带地中海贫血基因，中重度地中海贫血患者需要定期治疗，包括输血和螯合疗法以去除血液中多余的铁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/BGI-Genomics-report-uncovers-knowledge-gaps-and-barriers-to-thalassemia-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/BGI-Genomics-report-uncovers-knowledge-gaps-and-barriers-to-thalassemia-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bab39df-a48d-4f24-a189-eb629abeae77 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 14:19:19 -0500 BGI Genomics report uncovers knowledge gaps and barriers to thalassemia screening
赌博成瘾与长期病假风险增加有关根据《心理医学》发表的一项新研究，赌博成瘾会增加数年长期病假的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Gambling-addiction-linked-to-increased-risk-of-long-term-sick-leave.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Gambling-addiction-linked-to-increased-risk-of-long-term-sick-leave.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72e5975a-45f4-43a9-8271-efc81f9cf0e8 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 14:12:16 -0500 Gambling addiction linked to increased risk of long-term sick leave
Amalus Therapeutics 开发治疗癌症或纤维化疾病患者的创新方法根特大学和蓬勃发展的根特生物技术领域迎来了一个全新的衍生产品：Amalus Therapeutics 正在开发一类选择性针对腐败成纤维细胞的新型药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Amalus-Therapeutics-develops-innovative-approach-for-treating-病人-with-cancer-or-太多纤维化-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Amalus-Therapeutics-develops-innovative-approach-for-treating-病人-with-cancer-or-太多纤维化-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf538af8-7113-4732-be35-580bf5a616bc Mon, 20 Nov 2023 14:08:49 -0500 Amalus Therapeutics develops innovative approach for treating patients with cancer or fibrotic diseases
新型 3D 打印植入物可能彻底改变手术中的感染控制华盛顿州立大学研究人员开发的一种新型外科植入物在实验室测试中能够杀死 87% 的引起葡萄球菌感染的细菌，同时与现有植入物一样保持坚固且与周围组织相容。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Novel-3D-printed-implant-could-revolutionize-infection-control-in-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Novel-3D-printed-implant-could-revolutionize-infection-control-in-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99a92bb9-607d-4df5-9ee8-fb9ba12fd095 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 13:56:36 -0500 Novel 3D-printed implant could revolutionize infection control in surgery
图像引导手术可以缓解长期新冠患者的嗅觉异常症状根据下周在北美放射学会年会上公布的研究结果，研究人员使用图像引导的微创手术或许能够恢复长期感染新冠病毒的患者的嗅觉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Image-guided-procedure-may-alleviate-parosmia-symptoms-in-long-COVID-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Image-guided-procedure-may-alleviate-parosmia-symptoms-in-long-COVID-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f380b9f8-7a80-4e9e-beae-65d3d7f6c321 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 13:51:50 -0500 Image-guided procedure may alleviate parosmia symptoms in long COVID patients
中年时期内脏腹部脂肪含量较高可能会增加患阿尔茨海默病的风险根据下周在北美放射学会年会上公布的一项研究，中年时期内脏腹部脂肪含量较高与阿尔茨海默病的发展有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Higher-amounts-of-visceral-abdominal-fat-in-midlife-may-increase-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Higher-amounts-of-visceral-abdominal-fat-in-midlife-may-increase-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7668e245-a0cf-413e-9bc0-e853f0799a5c Mon, 20 Nov 2023 13:49:39 -0500 Higher amounts of visceral abdominal fat in midlife may increase Alzheimer's disease risk
